bit.name: Cortana Hack
bit.tooltip: Sorts Cortana in front of other transparent geometry.

bit.name: Always Draw Sky
bit.tooltip: Always draws sky 0, even if no +sky polygons are visible.

bit.name: Don't Strip Pathfinding
bit.tooltip: Always leaves pathfinding in, even for multiplayer scenario.

bit.name: Scripted
bit.tooltip: Level script will set this value; other settings here will be ignored.

bit.name: Invert
bit.tooltip: Result of function is 1 minus actual result.

bit.name: Always Active
bit.tooltip: Function does not deactivate when at or below lower bound.

value.name: Period
value.tooltip: Period for above function (lower values make function oscillate quickly; higher values make it oscillate slowly).

value.name: Scale Period By
value.tooltip: Multiply this function by above period

value.name: Scale Function By
value.tooltip: Multiply this function by result of above function.

value.name: Wobble Function
value.tooltip: Curve used for wobble.

value.name: Wobble Period
value.tooltip: Time it takes for magnitude of this function to complete a wobble.

value.name: Wobble Magnitude
value.tooltip: Amount of random wobble in the magnitude.

value.name: Square Wave Threshold
value.tooltip: If non-zero, all values above square wave threshold are snapped to 1.0, and all values below it are snapped to 0.0 to create a square wave.

value.name: Step Count
value.tooltip: Number of discrete values to snap to (e.g., step count of 5 snaps function to 0.00, 0.25, 0.50,0.75, or 1.00).

value.name: Sawtooth Count
value.tooltip: Number of times this function should repeat (e.g., sawtooth count of 5 gives function value of 1.0 at each of 0.25, 0.50, and 0.75, as well as at 1.0).

value.name: Scale Result by
value.tooltip: Multiply this function (e.g., from a weapon, vehicle) final result of all of the above math.

value.name: Bounds Mode
value.tooltip: Controls how bounds, below, are used.

value.name: Turn Off with
value.tooltip: If specified function is off, so is this function.

value.name: normal diff count
value.tooltip: initial number of actors on normal difficulty

value.name: insane diff count
value.tooltip: initial number of actors on insane difficulty (hard difficulty is midway between normal and insane)

value.name: swarm count
value.tooltip: number of cretures in swarm if a swarm is spawned at this location

value.name: initial movement distance
value.tooltip: before doing anything else, the actor will travel the given distance in its forward direction

value.name: first link do not set manually
animation graph
value.tooltip: leave this blank to use the unit's normal animation graph

bit.name: stop if death
bit.tooltip: this conversation will be aborted if any participant dies

bit.name: stop if damaged
bit.tooltip: an actor will abort this conversation if they are damaged

bit.name: stop if visible enemy
bit.tooltip: an actor will abort this conversation if they see an enemy

bit.name: stop if alerted to enemy
bit.tooltip: an actor will abort this conversation if they suspect an enemy

bit.name: player must be visible
bit.tooltip: this conversation cannot take place unless the participants can _see_ a nearby player

bit.name: stop other actions
bit.tooltip: participants stop doing whatever they were doing in order to perform this conversation

bit.name: keep trying to play
bit.tooltip: if this conversation fails initially, it will keep testing to see when it can play

bit.name: player must be looking
bit.tooltip: this conversation will not start until the player is looking at one of the participants

value.name: trigger distance
value.tooltip: distance the player must enter before the conversation can trigger

value.name: run-to-player dist
value.tooltip: if the 'involves player' flag is set, when triggered the conversation's participant(s) will run to within this distance of the player

value.name: use this object
value.tooltip: if a unit with this name exists, we try to pick them to start the conversation

value.name: set new name
value.tooltip: once we pick a unit, we name it this

bit.name: wait after until told to advance

value.name: addressee participant
value.tooltip: this field is only used if the addressee type is 'participant'

value.name: dialogue type
value.tooltip: when this ending is triggered, launch a dialogue event of the given type

value.name: dialogue type
value.tooltip: when this ending is triggered, launch a dialogue event of the given type

item.name: If ALL players in trigger volume
Player shot more than X seconds ago

value.name: Inside Cluster Sound
value.tooltip: Play only when player is inside cluster.

bit.name: Use Adjacent Cluster as Portal Scale
Use Adjacent Cluster as Exterior Scale

value.name: Spread Distance
value.tooltip: How far fog spreads into adjacent clusters: 0 defaults to 1.

value.name: Maximum Density
value.tooltip: Fog density clamps to this value.

value.name: Start Distance
value.tooltip: Before this distance, there is no fog.

value.name: Opaque Distance
value.tooltip: Fog becomes opaque (maximum density) at this distance from viewer.

value.name: Maximum Density2
value.tooltip: Fog density clamps to this value.

value.name: Start Distance2
value.tooltip: Before this distance, there is no fog.

value.name: Opaque Distance2
value.tooltip: Fog becomes opaque (maximum density) at this distance from viewer.

value.name: Planar Min Distance Bias
value.tooltip: Don't ask.

value.name: ecology margin
value.tooltip: distance from ecology boundary that creature begins to be repulsed

value.name: weight
value.tooltip: probability of producing at this source

value.name: production frequency
value.tooltip: How frequently boids are produced at one of the sources (limited by the max boid count)

value.name: neighborhood radius
value.tooltip: distance within which one boid is affected by another

value.name: avoidance radius
value.tooltip: distance that a boid tries to maintain from another

value.name: forward scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's desire to fly straight ahead

value.name: alignment scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's desire to align itself with neighboring boids

value.name: avoidance scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's desire to avoid collisions with other boids, when within the avoidance radius

value.name: leveling force scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boids desire to fly level

value.name: sink scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's desire to fly towards its sinks

value.name: perception angle
value.tooltip: angle-from-forward within which one boid can perceive and react to another

value.name: average throttle
value.tooltip: throttle at which boids will naturally fly

value.name: maximum throttle
value.tooltip: maximum throttle applicable

value.name: position scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's desire to be near flock center

value.name: position min radius
value.tooltip: distance to flock center beyond which an attracting force is applied

value.name: position max radius
value.tooltip: distance to flock center at which the maximum attracting force is applied

value.name: movement weight threshold
value.tooltip: The threshold of accumulated weight over which movement occurs

value.name: danger radius
value.tooltip: distance within which boids will avoid a dangerous object (e.g. the player)

value.name: danger scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's desire to avoid danger

value.name: random offset scale
value.tooltip: weight given to boid's random heading offset
